channel.title: Background
channel.description:
Hello again the all mighty help section... So i am working on a PK server with my friend, and when i was trying to change the client background to the picture my friend made, (in sprite.java because i couldn't seem to find the actual original background in the sprites folder...) this happened: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/d9c9d2e2e794941a6a826381d06cb311.png?1325151028[/img] *edit* the picture also got like reflected or something... the words are all backwards on one side but the other seems to be fine...
by the original background, i mean this: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/d9ce21c28eec5c9ff262cdbfc00e8b97.png?1325150131[/img]
Any ideas? :|

item.title: Background
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

The flames problem can be found in 10 seconds, It’s been posted over 1000 times. Always use Google and the Search feature before asking questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Background
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

I decided others might need this too so I’ll post where everyone can see hope you don’t mind here it is:

sure, for logo In Client.java (client sided) search for:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, “logo”, 0);

replace with:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, “logo”, 1); (that’s how it was for my client)

now for flames, Go into your client.java (client sided) find:

            method58(25106);
            method58(25106);

change to:

            //method58(25106);
            //method58(25106);

Read full topic

item.description:

Update-
I have fixed the reflective problem… now i just need to find out how to remove the flames.
I have pmed you both

item.title: Background
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

There’s nothing wrong with the background or what you did i believe you just have to find the middle of the sprite(or your background) find the middle if your using paint when you select the right half just flip it horizontal then save it and add it to the folder where you’re putting your sprite and it should work hope i was any help.

EDIT: and if you need the logo and flames removed just tell me i know how to remove both

Read full topic
